email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. We were hoping for something in the mid-40s. Can you check if the owner is willing to come down to $45.50? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I discussed with the owner, and they are willing to come down to $48.00 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. $48.00 is still a bit high for us. Can you push for $46.50? Also, can we confirm the laytime is 72 hours? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I managed to negotiate the freight rate down to $46.75 per metric ton. The laytime is confirmed at 72 hours. Let me know if we can proceed with this. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $46.75 works for us. Let’s proceed with the fixture. Please send over the recap for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, please find the fixture recap attached. To summarize: Vessel MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. Cargo: Crude Oil, Houston to Rotterdam. Laycan 15-20 October. Freight rate $46.75 per metric ton. Laytime 72 hours. Demurrage $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if everything looks good. Best, Sarah
